titles.title: Stand Up And Bless The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Stand up and bless the Lord your God newline Ye people of God's choice; newline Stand up and bless the Lord your God newline With heart and soul and voice.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Though high above all praise, newline Above all blessing high, newline Who would not fear His holy name, newline And laud and magnify?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O for the living flame newline From God's own altar brought, newline To touch our lips, our minds inspire, newline And wing to heaven our thought!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: God is our strength and song, newline Now is salvation ours; newline Then be God's love in Christ proclaimed newline With all our ransomed powers.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Stand up and bless the Lord; newline The Lord your God adore; newline Stand up and bless God's glorious name, newline Henceforth forevermore.
